description.lang: The Zooz Indoor Siren ZSE01 allows brings wireless control to a well-designed visual and audible alarm. Trigger the siren when other smart home devices detect unexpected activity and receive notifications when the alarm goes off. Z-Wave gateway controller required (sold separately).The siren acts as signal repeater when powered by AC adapter and is equipped with Z-Wave Plus for faster and more reliable wireless communication.Volume: 110dBPower: DC 5V/1A and 4 AAA (1.2V) batteries for back-up powerRange: Up to 100 feet line of sightOperating Temperature: 14F to 122FOperating Humidity:80%Installation and Use: Indoor only
Z-Wave Plus LifelineIf setting the association this siren may send the Switch_Binary_report to the node.
